docs.lead_paragraph: UNLESS one is a doting parent, the mother of a bad child is not deceived about it. Susie is a terror. The worried and mortified mother knows it, but cannot help it.

headline.main: The Question of Proper Control for a Bad Child -- Health the Chief Point at Issue in Most Cases.

docs.snippet: UNLESS one is a doting parent, the mother of a bad child is not deceived about it. Susie is a terror. The worried and mortified mother knows it, but cannot help it.

docs.lead_paragraph: THE question is frequently asked if some one will write an article telling the women who embroider just what kind of silk or cotton thread must be used on different kinds of material.
docs.snippet: THE question is frequently asked if some one will write an article telling the women who embroider just what kind of silk or cotton thread must be used on different kinds of material.

docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Feb. 9. -- President Roosevelt submitted to Congress to-day the report of his Country Life Commission. He accompanied it with a long message, in which the striking recommendation was made that the Department of Agriculture be transformed into the Department of Country Life, and its powers be increased from suggestion on how to raise the best and largest crops to lively interest in the most intimate affairs of the lives of the rural population.

headline.main: ROOSEVELT MESSAGE ON FARMERS' NEEDS; Wants a Federal Country Life Department to Look After All Their Affairs. SENDS REPORT ON INQUIRY Senators Openly Amused by the Message, While the House Does Not Pause for It.

docs.abstract: Pres T Roosevelt gets rept; sends it to Cong with message proposing Agr Dept be transformed into Dept of County Life and its powers be increased to aid agr development and farmers standard of living; extracts from rept and message
